alert.note: Alert for Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued January 06 at 3:18AM EST until January 07 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST FRIDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM FRIDAY TO 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Lake Effect Snow Warning, heavy lake effect snow and areas of blowing snow. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches in the most persistent lake snows through 1 AM tonight. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches Friday. * WHERE...Southern Erie county. * WHEN...For the Lake Effect Snow Warning, until 1 AM EST Friday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 1 AM Friday to 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4288 7844 4295 7822 4292 7840 4300 7809 4307 7808 4306 7829 4290 7891 4281 7890 4266 7916 4268 7886 TIME Y22M01D06T0500Z-Y22M01D06T1800Z COORD...4294 7834 4302 7833 4306 7850 4301 7863 4293 7894 4288 7889 4281 7890 4264 7919 4265 7901 4287 7856 TIME Y22M01D06T1800Z-Y22M01D07T0600Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
